paragraphs.text: AWS S3 Bucket Storage Node Configuration
codeName This property defines the name associated with the Open Storage Container used within the Superalgos system.
endpointUrl This is the URL used to access the files for download, Ideally you want to use a CloudFront distribution
The best option would be to use a CloudFront distrubition to take advantage of the caching, but using the bucket endpoint is also suitable.
bucketName This is the name of the bucket you created to store your uploaded files
bucketRegion This will overwrite the default region on your system or the a region supplied in the API secret
pathPrefix An optional path prefix to act like a file directory in S3
